$option$ select nmTerminalId,nmBussinessId,nmImsi,nmMsisdn,sum(intAppUpFlush),sum(intAppDownFlush), #intYear#,#intMonth#,#intWeek#,#intDay#,#intHour#,getdate(),intRaitype,#vcLocalIP# from $sourceTableName$ group by nmTerminalId,nmBussinessId,nmImsi,nmMsisdn,intRaitype

$option$ select group1.nmMsisdn, group1.vcParentGroupName,group1.vcGroupName,group2.vcParentGroupName,group2.vcGroupName, string(#intYear#,'-',#intMonth#,'-',#intDay#,' ',#intHour#,':00:00') startTime, string(#intYear#,'-',#intMonth#,'-',#intDay#,' ',#intHour#,':59:59') endTime, sum(group1.totalFlush+group2.totalFlush) totalFlush, group1.vccgi,group1.nmimei from (select nmMsisdn,vcParentGroupName,vcGroupName ,(sum(intAppUpFlush)+sum(intAppDownFlush)) as totalFlush, vccgi, nmimei from $sourceTableName$ inner join dtbGroupTree on ProductDimens = nmDimensId where nmTypeId = 1 and nmLevelsId = 2 and (vccgi <> '' or nmmsisdn <> 0) group by nmMsisdn, vccgi ,nmimei , intHour,vcParentGroupName,vcGroupName ) as group1, (select nmMsisdn,vcParentGroupName,vcGroupName ,(sum(intAppUpFlush)+sum(intAppDownFlush)) as totalFlush, vccgi,nmimei from $sourceTableName$ inner join dtbGroupTree on ProductDimens = nmDimensId where nmTypeId = 2 and nmLevelsId = 2 and (vccgi <> '' or nmmsisdn <> 0) group by nmMsisdn, vccgi ,nmimei , intHour,vcParentGroupName,vcGroupName ) as group2 where group1.nmMsisdn=group2.nmMsisdn and group1.vccgi=group2.vccgi and group1.nmimei=group2.nmimei group by group1.nmMsisdn,group1.vccgi,group1.nmimei ,group1.vcParentGroupName,group1.vcGroupName,group2.vcParentGroupName,group2.vcGroupName having totalFlush != 0 order by group1.vcParentGroupName,group1.vcGroupName,group2.vcParentGroupName,group2.vcGroupName,totalFlush
